title: Go Tell It on the Mountain - It can be inferred

content.question: It can be inferred from the phrase "with terror in his heart, and wonder" (second major paragraph) that John

choices.label: dreaded attending church services on Sundays
responded strongly but ambivalently to the church service
found the music in the church mystifying and unpleasant
was indifferent to the emotional force that lay behind the singing

content.answer: responded strongly but ambivalently to the church service

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
